description.desc_1: Automatic calorie calculation and a personalized meal plan
description.desc_2: for weight loss, maintenance, or gain

description_mobile.descm_1: Online BMI and macronutrient calculator: calculate your body mass index, daily intake of calories, proteins, fats, carbs, and water.
description_mobile.descm_2: Discover the composition of foods, monitor your nutrition, and choose effective exercises for health, weight loss, and fitness maintenance.

calculation.extra_active: Extra active (very hard exercise/sports & physical job, or training twice a day)
calculation.notation: The data is used only for calculations, is not stored without your consent, and is not shared with third parties

result.title: Calculation Results
result.description: The calculation is based on the data you provided and generally accepted formulas. You can change the parameters at any time

tips.bmi: The indicator reflects the relationship between height and weight, but does not account for body composition — whether the weight comes from fat, muscle, or water
tips.bmr: The amount of energy the body uses at rest
tips.water: The daily amount of all fluids consumed, including water, soups, drinks, and other liquids

error.general: An error occurred while fetching data.

nutrition.title: Products
nutrition.description: A table of foods with calories, proteins, fats, and carbs (CPCF) helps plan your diet and monitor your nutrition

workout.title: Workout
workout.description: A catalog of exercises for all fitness levels: workouts for weight loss, muscle gain, and maintaining fitness. Choose effective exercises for home and gym.

product.title: - calorie content and nutritional value
product.description_1: On this page you will find complete information about the product —
product.description_2: its calorie content per 100 g, protein, fat and carbohydrate content, as well as detailed information about vitamins and minerals.

menu.menu_notation: The meal plan is for informational purposes only and is intended for a healthy adult. If you have medical conditions or restrictions, consultation with a specialist is recommended. All values and calculations are approximate.
menu.save_menu_title: To save the meal plan, sign in or create an account
menu.save_menu_descr: Registration will give you access to saving, history, and editing meal plans.

contact.title: Contacts
contact.description: Write to us if you have any questions about the BodyFlow service, calorie and macro calculations, or the website functionality. We carefully review all inquiries.

home.title: Calorie & Macro Calculator with a 5-Day Meal Plan — Online Calculation

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: This Privacy Policy ("Policy") explains how BodyFlow (https://bodyflow.com.ua) collects, uses, and protects users’ personal data. By using the website and its features (calorie calculator, meal plan generator, personal account), you agree to the terms of this Policy.
privacy.s1_1_li1: Name and email address during registration.
privacy.s1_1_li2: Data entered into calculators (age, height, weight, activity level, nutrition goals, and related parameters).
privacy.s1_1_li3: Information stored in your personal account (calculations, meal plans, preferences).
privacy.s1_2_li1: IP address, device type, and browser type.
privacy.s1_2_li3: Visited pages and time spent on the website.
privacy.s2_1_li1: To ensure proper operation of the service.
privacy.s2_1_li2: To calculate calorie needs and generate personalized nutrition recommendations.
privacy.s2_1_li3: To store user data in personal accounts.
privacy.s2_1_li4: To analyze website usage and improve functionality.
privacy.s2_1_li5: To display advertisements through third-party services (including Google AdSense).
privacy.s3_1_text: BodyFlow uses cookies to ensure proper website functionality, analyze traffic, and display advertisements.
privacy.s3_2_text: We may use Google AdSense to display advertisements. Google and its partners may use cookies to show ads based on your previous visits to this and other websites.
privacy.s3_2_li1: Google uses advertising cookies to provide personalized ads.
privacy.s3_2_li2: Users may opt out of personalized advertising via Google Ads Settings (https://adssettings.google.com).
privacy.s3_2_li3: Other third-party vendors may also use cookies for advertising purposes.
privacy.s3_3_text: You can disable cookies in your browser settings; however, this may affect certain website features.
privacy.s4_1_text: We do not sell or share personal data with third parties except in the following cases:
privacy.s4_1_li1: Hosting providers and technical contractors supporting website functionality.
privacy.s5_1_text: We implement technical measures to protect personal data, including HTTPS encryption and restricted access to stored information.
privacy.s5_2_text: Data is retained for the duration of the user account or until deletion is requested.
privacy.s6_1_li1: Request access to your personal data.
privacy.s6_1_li2: Request correction or deletion of your data.
privacy.s7_text: BodyFlow provides nutritional calculations and recommendations for informational purposes only. The content does not constitute medical advice and should not replace professional consultation with a healthcare provider.
privacy.s8_text: We may update this Policy from time to time. Updates take effect upon publication on the website.
privacy.s9_text: If you have questions regarding personal data processing, please contact us:

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.intro: These Terms of Service ("Terms") govern access to and use of the BodyFlow website (https://bodyflow.com.ua). By using the website, you agree to these Terms.
terms.s1_text: BodyFlow provides online tools for calorie calculation, meal plan generation, and nutritional recommendations. The service is for informational purposes only.
terms.s2_li2: You agree to provide accurate and truthful information.
terms.s2_li3: You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your login credentials.
terms.s2_li4: We may suspend or delete accounts that violate these Terms.
terms.s3_text: All information and calculations provided on the website are for informational purposes only. BodyFlow is not a medical service. You should consult a healthcare professional before making significant dietary changes. We are not responsible for outcomes resulting from the use of the website.
terms.s4_text: All website materials (texts, design, algorithms, logos, graphics) are the property of BodyFlow or used lawfully. Unauthorized reproduction or distribution is prohibited.
terms.s5_li1: You may not use the website for unlawful purposes.
terms.s5_li2: You may not attempt to disrupt server operation or gain unauthorized access.
terms.s5_li3: Automated data scraping without permission is prohibited.
terms.s6_text: The website may display advertisements from third parties (including Google AdSense). We are not responsible for the content of external websites or advertisements.
terms.s7_text: We may update these Terms at any time. Updated versions become effective upon publication.
terms.s8_text: These Terms are governed by the laws of Ukraine.
terms.s9_text: If you have questions regarding these Terms, please contact us:

about.title: About BodyFlow
about.seo_title: About BodyFlow — Calorie & Macro Calculator and Meal Plan
about.seo_description: BodyFlow is an online nutrition service with a calorie and macro calculator, 5-day meal plan generator, and food database with nutrients.
about.seo_keywords: calorie calculator online, macro calculator, calorie and macro calculator, 5-day meal plan, weekly meal plan, food database with nutrients, nutrition calculator, weight loss nutrition, muscle gain meal plan, personalized diet plan
about.intro: BodyFlow is an online nutrition service that helps you calculate your daily calorie and macronutrient needs, generate a personalized meal plan, and explore detailed nutrient information for foods.
about.s1_text: We create simple and accurate tools so you can manage your nutrition without complex spreadsheets or constant manual calculations.
about.s2_li1: calculate calories, protein, fat, and carbohydrates based on your personal data and goals.
about.s2_li2: automatic meal plan generation based on your calculated calorie and macro needs.
about.s2_li3: a comprehensive food database with detailed nutrient information for better planning.
about.s3_li1: Understand how many calories you need daily.
about.s3_li2: Create a meal plan without manual calculations.
about.s3_li3: Track nutrients and make informed nutrition choices.
about.s3_li4: Reach your goal: weight loss, muscle gain, or maintenance.
about.s4_text: BodyFlow calculations and recommendations are provided for informational purposes only and do not constitute medical advice. If you have medical conditions, consult a qualified healthcare professional.
about.s5_text: To make nutrition simple and accessible so you can quickly calculate your needs, generate a meal plan, and move toward your goals.
about.s6_text: If you have questions, ideas, or found an issue — feel free to contact us.
about.button: Calculate Calories & Get Your Meal Plan
